job_details.degree_required: BS in computer science or engineering degree or a related field or equivalent work experience required.

jd: From: Ganesh, Sun-itsolution ganesh@sun-itsolutions.com Reply to: ganesh@sun-itsolutions.com Database Developer (T-SQL)Term: 12 monthsLocation: Onsite Mon-Friday in Weehawken New Jersey 07086Client is requiring the candidate to have strong T-SQL programming, along with solid python & shell scripting. (needs to hire one of these)Client is requiring the candidate to have strong T-SQL programming, along with solid Perl & shell scripting. (needs two consultants for this role) BS in computer science or engineering degree or a related field or equivalent work experience required. Experience in Requirement Analysis, Strategic Analysis, Software Development Fundamentals, Design, Development, Maintenance, Testing and Implementation of efficient data flow and batch processes in applications. Experience in TSQL programming, Perl or Python and Shell scripting. Good understanding of relation transactional databases like Sybase and MSSQL is a MUST;. Strong knowledge of Extraction Transformation and Loading (ETL) processes using TSQL with Java/Perl scripting. Experience in TSQL code development, performance tuning, query optimization and batch or ETL creation experience.
